Pipeline
========
The picture below presents a pipeline for Lize Analyzer web app.

.. image:: ./_images/dash_pipeline.png
   :width: 700
   :alt: dash_pipeline.png

:download:`Download a pdf file with a pipeline schematic.<./_resource/dash_pipeline.pdf>`

:download:`Download an xml file with a pipeline schematic.<./_resource/dash_pipeline.xml>` This schematic can be opened and edited using an online editor: `https://products.aspose.app/diagram/eng/flowchart <https://products.aspose.app/diagram/eng/flowchart>`_
